trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> property is set or its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件时才会发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A>设置属性或其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A>属性是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: When you handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell.
trans-unit.target: 当处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display shortcut menus determined by the current state or value of a cell.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要显示当前状态或单元格的值来确定的快捷菜单，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event also occurs whenever the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks the cell.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>每当也会发生事件的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击该单元格。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is initialized with the value of the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property, which the event value overrides.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用单元格的值初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性，该事件值重写属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> value for multiple cells.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>多个单元格的值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property or handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定快捷菜单，为各个行而不是通过设置行的各个单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性或处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting overrides the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> event overrides both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> event and the row <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 单元格<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置重写行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded>事件替代同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded>事件和行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ContextMenuStrip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu, however, to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定`null`为单元格快捷菜单，但是，若要禁止行的快捷菜单重写。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellContextMenuStripNeededEventArgs"></xref> class.
The column index of cell that the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: 发生此事件的单元格的列索引。

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that the event occurred for.
trans-unit.target: 在事件发生的单元格的行索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the cell that raised the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置引发的单元格的快捷菜单<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContextMenuStripNeeded"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This property initially contains the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if it has been set for a cell.
trans-unit.target: 此属性最初包含值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>如果单元格已设置的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ContextMenuStrip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
